description:
Take this course and become an "accredited freelancer" with the Association of Freelancers. Use the free tools on AOFreelancers to save time, win more work and make your freelancing life easier.

Membership is exclusive to people who take this course. You cannot become a member any other way!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

There are millions of freelancers around the world but most struggle to make a good income because they don't know the secrets contained in this course. It took me years of hard work, stress and trying different techniques to perfect what I teach you. There's no need for you to experience the sleepless nights that I did. I have spent years perfecting my knowledge so you don't have to. Simply take this course and become an expert in freelancing too.

IN THIS COURSE YOU WILL SEE:

  • Exactly how I made over $150,000 through freelancing in 2014
  • Be given real life examples to help your learning
  • No fluff, padding, theory or BS that you get in other courses. Straight to the point tips that will help your freelancing career
  • Information that you cannot get elsewhere - nothing taken from the internet or from other courses, just things that I have learned myself
  • Advice on topics such as the health issues that freelancers experience which will have a massive effect on your life (I wish I knew this before I started)
  • The number 1 freelance tip for success - "Saying No"


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My advice will not only help you on Elance, oDesk, Freelancer, People Per Hour & Guru. I also teach you how to pick up work outside of these platforms.

Along with the Udemy 30 day guarantee, I give you my promise that if you use the information outlined in this course, you too can become a successful freelancer.

WHY I'M THE BEST PERSON TO INSTRUCT YOU:

  • Earned over $150,000 through freelancing in 2014 and on course to earn more in 2015 (Evidence = Veni Vidi Vici Ltd (UK Company) Profit & Loss Accounts section of Annual Accounts for 2014)
  • Ranked first for both "PPC" and "Pay Per Click" on Elance for 21 months (Between July 2013 and March 2015) which put me above 19,000 other freelancers in the same field.(See video & image proof of this in the free "About Me" lecture in my Udemy course)
  • Perfect 5 Star feedback on all my profiles across the freelancing sites
  • Published the book "The Crowdsourced Guide To Freelancing" in 2014 (Which you can buy on Amazon or can download for free through the Association of Freelancers website)
  • Founder & CEO of the Association of Freelancers (AOFreelancers)
  • I've been hiring freelancers since 2006 (I therefore have knowledge from both perspectives, as the client and as the freelancer)
title: How to Jumpstart and Sustain a Freelancing Business
